body:
I agree with Dave. Add a new convenience function will not solve the
problem: if the user knows to use it, he/she can also write the two lines
out, but if they don't know about the problem, it's very probable that they
don't know about the proposed convenience function either.

Not to mention that code that uses the new function will not compile under
older Go releases, and I doubt people will trade compatibility with older
Go releases for such a trivial convenience function.
